ARABIC: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When the magicians came, Musa said to them, 'Throw whatever you have to throw!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So when the magicians arrived, Moses said to them: "Cast whatever (spell) you have to cast."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And when the sorcerers came Moses said to them: 'Cast whatever you wish to cast.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When all the magicians were brought to his court, Moses asked them to cast down what they wanted to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when the magicians came, Moosa said to them, “Cast whatever you intend to cast.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when the sorcerers came, Musa said to them: "Cast down what you want to cast!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when the magicians came, Musa said to them: Cast down what you have to cast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then, when the sorcerers came, Moses said to them, 'Cast you down what you will cast.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the wizards came, Moses said unto them: Cast your cast!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the magicians came, Moses said to them, "Cast down whatever you are going to cast down."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when the magicians were come, Musa said unto them: cast down that which ye are going to cast down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So when the magicians came, Moses said to them, ‘Throw down what you have to throw.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the sorcerers came, Moses said to them: "Throw ye what ye (wish) to throw!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the sorcerers came, Musa (Moses) said to them: "Cast down what you want to cast!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When the sorcerers came, Moses said to them: 'Cast down what you will cast'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when the sorcerers came, Moses said to them, “Throw whatever you have to throw.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So when the magicians came, Moses said to them, "Throw down whatever you will throw."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:80] And when the sorcerers came, Moses said to them, after they had said to him, Either you cast, or we shall be the casters! [Q. 7:115]: ‘Cast your cast!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when the wizards came, Moses said unto them: Cast your cast) cast your staffs and ropes!
